section.title: OpenStack Compute (Compute Node services)
section.para:
Just like with the Cloud Controller, the OpenStack Compute service is installed on the Compute Node. However, this time the nova-compute service is installed. This provides the Compute Node the capability to host virtual machines.
Install the OpenStack Compute package: # apt-get install nova-compute-kvm # yum install openstack-nova-compute # zypper install openstack-nova-compute kvm
In a virtual environment, use the nova-compute-qemu package, which provides software-based virtualization. The nova-compute-kvm package requires a server with native Hardware Virtual Maschine (HVM) support and most virtual environments do not provide this support. But if your virtual environment supports nested virtualization, you can use the nova-compute-kvm package.
In a virtual environment, use the qemu package, which provides software-based virtualization. The kvm package requires a server with native Hardware Virtual Maschine (HVM) support and most virtual environments do not provide this support. But if your virtual environment supports nested virtualization, you can use the kvm package.
